title: Understanding Milieu Therapy
text: Milieu therapy is a therapeutic approach that involves creating a structured and supportive environment for clients. It focuses on the social and community aspects of therapy.

title: Key Components of Milieu Therapy
text: Consider the role of daily routines, community interactions, and relationships in the therapeutic process. How do these elements contribute to a client's treatment?

hintAnswer: clients are treated in a structured, safe environment where their participation in $$day-to-day$$ routines, communities, and relationships is the method of therapy
